title: The incidence of Electrocardiographic (ECG) changes suggestive of myocardial infarction in patients attending Kalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital diabetes clinic
details: BN Xhekwani, M de Villiers, DG van Zyl - … , Metabolism and Diabetes of South Africa, 2025
abstract: Aims: This study aims to determine the incidence of new electrocardiographic (ECG) changes suggestive of myocardial infarction (MI) in diabetic patients, both with and without typical symptoms. Additionally, it seeks to identify other ECG abnormalities …

title: Sex-specific performance of electrocardiographic criteria for left ventricular hypertrophy in elite athletes
details: MA Van Diepen, JJN Daems, SM Verwijs… - Heart Rhythm
abstract: Background In athletes, left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) criteria based on electrocardiograms (ECG) have been validated almost exclusively in men using echocardiography. Sex-specific cardiac magnetic resonance (CMR) validation is …
